message:
Do you wish to make a difference to your community? Does bringing smiles to the faces of people always give you that feeling of self satisfaction?
This is your chance to amaze us with your Project Proposal to make the society around you happier!!
Hurry up and register at http://www.happiness-iitkgp.org/happiness/registration.php!!
Grants and prizes worth more than INR 1 lakh up for grabs!!

Presenting another competition in the Science of Happiness Challenge series, we invite applications for the Happiest Posters and Paintings!!
Send us your entries by registering yourself at http://www.happiness-iitkgp.org/happiness/registration.php!!
Prizes and grants worth over INR 1 lakh up for grabs!!

You can go through the guidelines at http://www.happiness-iitkgp.org/happiness/pdf/Project%20Grant-rev.pdf

Design Credits : Spectra

Vivekanand Kendra IIT Kharagpur Branch is organizing a lecture on topic "Lessons of Crisis Management from Ramayana" to be delivered by Shri. Hanumanth Rao (All India Treasurer, Vivekananda Kendra, Kanyakumari) on 7th September 2016 at 6.00 pm in V1 Hall Vikramshila Complex, IIT Kharagpur.

Open IIT Case Study Results:

1st Position is shared by:
Team Azad One & Team Azad Two with 80 points each

2nd Position:
Team Infinity from RP Hall with 79 points

P.S. - Team Innovation from MT hall was leading the tally with 82 points, but due to crossing the time limit for presentation, the score was deducted to 77.2 as per the rules. This clearly shows how important the presentation time is or rather how important each and every parameter of the Judging criteria is.

Congratulations to the winning teams! :)

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Kharagpur Open Source Society's photo. Time for the first event of this session! As they say, any good open source developer worth his (or her) salt uses Linux. As a part of introducing awareness about Open Source in the campus, KOSS, in association with Metakgp and IEEE Student Branch, IIT Kharagpur, is organising the Ubuntu Install Fest. Date: 4th September, Sunday Venue: Room 119 - CSE Department Time - 2 to 6 pm. Be there! Note: Please bring a pendrive along with your laptop, and ensure there is enough charge for the installation to complete smoothly. Written instructions: https://wiki.metakgp.org/w/How_to_install_Ubuntu_as_Dual_Boot
story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Kharagpur Open Source Society's photo.

message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Cultural, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Technology students gymkhana presents Open IIT English elocution. Date: 6th September. Venue : F116. Time : 6pm onwards. Register at : https://goo.gl/forms/BFmRZyfbl3MvLQR73 RULES : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zf8SS4RvDzLeJd59tYJfY_LgPpSqL6jnyU0f7FVk-CE/edit?usp=sharing Note : The time for elocution is 4 minutes(3+1) Contact Dhruv Mahajan(8890166175) or the G.Sec So-cult of your hall for any doubts

message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Cultural, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Hi all . The "OPEN IIT SKETCHING" event which was cancelled on 28th august is being re-held on 4th SEPTEMBER ,from 2pm-5PM @ S302 . Contact your hall GSEC-SOCULT for the clear idea about the rules of the event :) PS: find the rules here in this link https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QYejkD_SuvNA1x5ym6F-FdCyh-w6WXQQq5B4odPqKdg/edit?usp=sharing

message:
Rekhi Centre of Excellence for the Science of Happiness & Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur present to you the Science of Happiness Challenge on the occasion of the 1st International Workshop on the Science of Happiness, to be held on 24th and 25th of September on campus.

Visit http://sandhi-iitkgp.org/happiness for more details on the exciting competitions coming your way, with prizes and grants worth over INR 1 lakh!!

Rekhi Centre of Excellence for the Science of Happiness & Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur present to you the Science of Happiness Challenge on the occasion of the 1st International Workshop on the Science of Happiness, to be held on 24th and 25th of September on campus.

Visit http://sandhi-iitkgp.org/happiness for more details on the exciting competitions coming your way, with prizes and grants worth over INR 1 lakh!!

Azad hall brings you the biggest treasure hunt adventure KHOJ.
Collect all the clues spanning the whole campus by solving mind boggling poke riddles to win exciting goodies, T-shirts and much more. Also get a chance to revisit your childhood through poke-events.

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Net Impact IIT Kharagpur's photo. Net Impact in association with Career Development Centre (CDC) is conducting a Workshop on Higher studies in the USA (MS/PhD programs) with Educidate Founder Mentor Samudranil Chatterjee including a Seminar followed by a unique One to One Mentoring session. Date: 4th Sep 2016, Sunday Venue : V2 Time: 10:30 AM Register: http://tinyurl.com/ni-workshop
